name: Disinfector
description:
Disinfector is a 2D game where you run around, trying to disinfect the world around you. You will need to challenge the corruption in order to survive!

But will you?...

Controls

For Player 1 (Red) use keys WASD to move.

For Player 2 (BLUE) use ARROW KEYS to move.

Use your mouse to click on buttons.

Press Escape to go to the title screen.

Gamemodes

Disinfector has 3 exciting gamemodes to choose from:

Disinfect - Disinfect the world from corruption

Speedrun - See how fast you can corrupt the world

Versus - See who can infect/disinfect the world first!

Contact

If you need to contact me for anything such as removal of fonts, images or any media used, for support or for permission, contact me at

Hansengames00@Gmail.com

Bugs

Please report any bugs in the discussion or on our discord server.

https://discord.gg/Qxe6Rqn

Extra Information

I would appreciate every penny of donations as it helps the development of the game and keeps it alive!

I will try my best to update Disinfector as regularly as possible in order to maintain interest.
